content:
Hello! Is there dedicated introduction course to define certain structures like vector spaces and prove theorems on them?

Or may be dedicated course for linear algebra in specific.
@Dmitry Polyakov A new resource along these lines is a linear algebra game written by a group led by @Colleen Robles.
That link is only for Lean 3, right?
It would not be hard to port though. The Lean 4 version of the game maker is much easier to use and develop on than the Lean 3 version.
